title: Am I able to get gold border?
body: Hello, I just need to know If I recently got chapt banned for 9 games and my honor level is 0. Am I able to get the golden border if I get gold when the season ends? Or not? To quit trying to get it before season ends. Thank you

replies.body:
Riot has said that yo uneed honor lvl 2 to be able to get ranked rewards

HMMMMMM let's think

You're honor lvl 0, will you get rewards?

The answer is no , you won't get season end rewards , but however , in next season , the boarder you have will reflect your current rank
So you wouldn't have to worry about the boarder
it is very much possible. but i wouldn't
From what i understand, honor does not effect rank boarder rewards. Could very well be wrong here but... from what i understand...

I'm aware of that. What they were asking is not if they'll have access to honor rewards or the victorious skin. They are asking if it is possible to get the gold border if they gets gold, but are still below honor level 2.

As you know, you need to be honor level 2 to get ranked rewards this season.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068-League-of-Legends-2018-Season-Rewards-Update

Hmm... it didnt say anything about honor in the first one, but you are right. It says the honor is needed there.

Though it so says they tried to make it easier to get back up to honor 2, so they still have a chance.

So you'll unlikely get it. You need honor 2.
